document.full_text: the house of representatives on tuesday defeated a bill to raise the debt limit in a vote staged by republicans to strengthen their push for deep spending cuts in negotiations with the white house.
document.title: debt-limit hike fails in house in symbolic vote
lines_and_colors: the house of representatives on tuesday defeated a bill to raise the debt limit in a vote staged by republicans to strengthen their push for deep spending cuts in negotiations with the white house.
